pitrou commented on PR #14446:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14446#issuecomment-1282006040

   For example the link to `conan-maximum` should be https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions/runs/3271725954/jobs/5381859092, not https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow//tree/ARROW-18083-bump-zlib-0-github-conan-maximum

raulcd commented on PR #14446:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14446#issuecomment-1282067185

   > For example the link to `conan-maximum` should be https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions/runs/3271725954/jobs/5381859092, not https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow//tree/ARROW-18083-bump-zlib-0-github-conan-maximum
   
   There has been several issues following this ticket:
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/1e481b5d6dc6537e1994a4ff03334e95c7cfca93
   We added a wait time but sometimes some actions take quite a lot of time to start, so we use the default branch instead of the run URL. I am going to open a ticket, if the individual run is not found we probably should use the original URL we used to use, in your example would be:
   https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions?query=branch:ARROW-18083-bump-zlib-0-github-conan-maximum

raulcd commented on PR #14446:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14446#issuecomment-1282076857

   I've created https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18085 to track the issue

pitrou commented on PR #14446:

   The MinGW failures [here](https://github.com/pitrou/arrow/actions/runs/3271698108/jobs/5381800158#step:11:375) are weird but I doubt they are related:
   ```
   
   The following tests FAILED:
   	  1 - arrow-array-test (Exit code 0xc0000139
   )
   	  2 - arrow-buffer-test (Exit code 0xc0000139
   )
   	  3 - arrow-extension-type-test (Exit code 0xc0000139
   )
   	  4 - arrow-misc-test (Exit code 0xc0000139
   )
   
   [etc.]
   ```
   
   Have we already seen them?

raulcd commented on PR #14446:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14446#issuecomment-1282118569

   > Have we already seen them?
   
   They seem to be happening in other PRs:

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.

fields.description:
ZLib recently released version 1.2.13, which includes a security fix.
We should bump the vendored version before 10.0.0.
